SGCCRfC Wiki

GitHub Repositories

Top-rated, active scientific GitHub repositories across domains.

üßÆ Numerical Methods

  • FEniCS Project
    https://github.com/FEniCS
    Open-source finite element library.

  • Deal.II
    https://github.com/dealii/dealii
    FEM library for adaptive mesh refinement.

üåã Geophysics & Seismology

  • ObsPy
    https://github.com/obspy/obspy
    Python toolbox for seismology.

  • SeisPy
    https://github.com/seispy
    Seismic data processing and event detection.

  • SPECFEM2D/3D
    https://github.com/geodynamics
    Spectral-element seismic modeling.

üåç Earth Science

  • GMTSAR
    https://github.com/gmtsar/gmtsar
    InSAR processing toolkit.

  • PyGMT
    https://github.com/GenericMappingTools/pygmt
    Python API for GMT.

  • openquake
    https://github.com/gem/oq-engine
    Earthquake hazard modeling engine.

    https://github.com/nearspace-labs/pygnss
